name: Binh Tien Farmstay Full Day
description: There is no better way to experience the real living of local people in Mekong Delta than staying a night with the local family. Binh Tien Farmstay offers you chance to off the beaten track and explore absolute non-touristy places, to see real daily activities of the local people, to enjoy local dishes as authentic as you can get and to have an intimate chat with local family about life in Mekong Delta over the rice wine.
